newsitem.title: USA: CIBCR leading inflation index 105.1 in January.
newsitem.headline: CIBCR leading inflation index 105.1 in January.

text.p: The Center for International Business Cycle Research (CIBCR) said its leading inflation index (LII) rose to 105.1 in January from a revised 104.3 in December.
Rises in the number of purchasing managers reporting higher prices, the growth rate of industrial materials prices and the rate of employment helped push the index higher, CIBCR said.
Recent performance of the LII "is a strong acceleration, but it is still brief and tentative," CIBCR said.
